page.title: 16DEMOGRAPHIC SURVEY - SUDBURY
page.content: All of the houses in the main part of Sudbury village were surveyed using a questionnaire, a total of 33 houses. {_____________________________________ {HOUSEHOLD SIZE Number of 1 2 3 4 5 people 33% 27% 15% 18% 6% {______________________________________ At least one person in 35% of households had been born in Sudbury. Many had lived there for a long time.{ {______________________________________ {TIME LIVED }<10 10-20 20-30 30-40 >40 {IN SUDBURY {(years)} 21% 15% 6% 12% 27% {______________________________________ {PLACE OF }Sudbury ________________31% {ORIGIN} Local villages _________18% Derbyshire _____________14% Neighbouring Counties___22% Elsewhere_______________15% {______________________________________
